intro: Euphrasia spectabilis, commonly known as the showy eyebright, is a flowering plant native to Europe and parts of Asia. It is characterized by its delicate, yellow-orange flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded areas such as woodlands and stream banks. Its leaves are opposite, ovate, and covered in fine hairs. Euphrasia spectabilis is part of the Scrophulariaceae family, which includes other flowering plants with similar morphological features.
